title: Soundproofing my studio: the devil's in the details (moving 05)
description:
Soundproofing is an art. Here's how we're doing it—starting with the walls.

Mentioned in this video:

  - Gamers Nexus Hemi-Anechoic Chamber: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eUqYTenB2A0
  - LTT Server Room Soundproofing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u0PkoYN45tY

00:00 - Soundproofing is an art
01:04 - Framing a normal wall
02:02 - Framing a studio wall
03:31 - Ceiling treatments
04:30 - Holes, electrical, and HVAC
05:23 - Creating... an echo chamber?
06:00 - Sound treatment (on the inside)
